title: 35  Fernand Léger, Ballet mécanique, 1924
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">35  
Fernand Léger (French, 1881–1955)  
Ballet mécanique  
1924  
35mm black-and-white film; 12 min.  
Original score by George Antheil (American, 1900–1958), as performed in 1989 by the New Palais Royale Orchestra and Percussion Ensemble, conducted by Maurice Peress  
Courtesy Cohen Film Collection

</section><section id="figures">Fernand Léger, Ballet mécanique, 1924.
